Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class receives the four players, the game manager and stores them until it's time to start the game
    Author:
    Michelle M Ortiz & Mario Orbegoso

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(java.lang.String game, Player p1)
      Constructor that receives the specification of the game and the creator of the game

      Returns a boolean value to whether a new member has joined the game or not
